name: ちみも
summary: Chimimo is a messenger of hell and a shape-shifting evil demon. Chimimo is one of 12 evil demons whose mission is to turn the human world into hell. The 12 demons along with "Hell-san" go to the human world, but Hell-san and Chimimo become freeloaders to a family of three sisters named Mutsumi, Hazuki, and Mei.
info:
• 话数: *
  • 放送开始: 2022年7月
  • 别名: Chimimo
  • 导演: ぴのあると
  • 系列构成: 上野贵美子
  • 人物设定: 堤舞
  • 总作画监督: 堤舞
  • 音乐: 小林康太
  • 动画制作: 新锐动画
